Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Greeting>Hey, been a while!<sp:5:0:0> You helped track down
my friends in Gerudo Canyon, right?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>We went our separate ways after that.


I was walking around, feeling lonely,
when I heard this pretty melody and just
had to stop and listen.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Funny running into you here. I didn't peg
you for a music lover!
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This music brings back memories of the
journey that brought me here.

I was so hopeless after my friends got
lost in Gerudo Canyon.

But they got out safe in the end.<sp:5:0:0>
All thanks to you, of course!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yeah! Now's my chance! I can listen to
the music from up close!
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This really brings me back. I can almost
see my friends' faces again.

<sp:3:0:2:0101>I wonder how they're doing...
